page.title: 13Boats and Yachts in Voe.
page.content: The Delta Dawn is a small fishing boat which is based at Voe.It is 7.5 metres in length and 2.5 metres wide. The boat's registration number is LK 23.It is powered by a Perkins diesel engine which can make the boat travel at speeds of up to 8 knots. The boat is quite well equipped.It has an echo sounder to help locate the fish.It also has a CB and a VHF radio aboard. This boat is used for pleasure fishing.Lobster pots are set in the voe and queens and scallops are also fished for. In the summer season other boats can be seen moored off in the voe.At the moment there are two yachts,a speed boat and a Shetland model. These boats are overhauled each spring before they go in the water.
